name: An Awkward Pong Game
description:
An Awkward Pong Game where you can battle against yourself or your friend!

Press W or S to move your paddle up and down

Player 2 (Ball):

Press the Left Mouse Button or Right Mouse Button to boost or juke your friend respectively!

Whoever wins holds the bragging rights for being better at... An Awkward Pong Game.

The Game is a Python3 Executable which requires the package pygame to be installed. (More information to be provided in the .zip file's README.TXT)

Have fun!
